content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE traditional Chinese concept or value (respect for elders and teachers, guanxi, saving face, modesty, social harmony, etc.) In your presentation, describe this traditional concept or value and explain its significance.
